revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 39.;Ptolema, daughter of Heras in conjunction with Tanouris, daughter of Isidoros (Poudes);;(left margin: drachmas 40) orchard taxes for the 12th year: apomoira drachmas 7, obol 1, chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1, chalki 2, naubion obols 4.5, surcharges drachma 1, obols 5;;eparourion drachmas 8, obol 0.5, chalki 2, surcharges drachma 1, obols 4, chalki 2, kollybos obols 2;;geometria for the 12t year drachmas 18, chalki 2, surcharge drachma 1, obol 1, in total drachmas 19, obol 1, chalki 2;;Polydeukes, son of Heras, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapasion, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Ischyrion, grandson of Pasoknopaios, mother Tepheros, drachmas 4;;Leontas, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Ptolemaios, mother Kastorous, drachmas 12;;Harpalos, son of Apion, grandson of Harpalos, mother Valeria, drachmas 12;;Pasion, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Petheus, mother Segathis, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 116, obols 14;;Pharmouthi 1:;Mysthes, son of Phaesis, grandson of Mysthes, mother Aunchis, drachmas 8;;Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Ptolema, drachmas 8;;Petheus, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Petheus, mother Segathis, drachmas 4, obols 28;;Ptollous, daughter of Mesoeris (Koulas);;(in left margin: drachmas 12, obols 20) interest on loan from Sempronius Gemellus in the 13th year;;private account in total drachmas 13, obols 3.5, chalki 2;;Ptolemais, daughter of Apollonios (Euphrosyne);;(in left margin: drachmas 12, obols 22) orchard taxes for the 12th year: apomoira drachmas 2, obols 5, tax on the produce of oil obols 2.5, chalki 2, naubion obols 2, surcharges obols 4.5;;eparourion drachma 1, obols 5.5, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5, chalki 2, in total drachmas 6, obols 3.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 7, obol 0.5, surcharges obols 2.5, chalki 2, in total drachmas 7, obols 3, chalki 2;;Phasis, son of Tesenouphris, grandson of Harphaesis, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Aphrodisios, son of Onnophris, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Ptolema, drachmas 8;;Pasion, son of Petsiris, grandson of Pasion, mother Thases, drachmas 8;;Phaesis, son of Pekmes alias Heuremon, mother Sambathion, drachmas 4;;Achillas, son of Ptollis, grandson of Hieranouphis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Patkonnis, son of Mysthes, grandson of Patkonnis, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 8;;Anchorimphis, son of Petheus the younger, grandson of Anchorimphis, mother Apollonous, drachmas 8;;Petsaraipis, son of Hatres, grandson of Imouthes, mother Soeris, drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Sisois, grandson of Petsiris, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Sokmenis, son of Sokmenis . . . (Tamaus);;(in left margin: drachmas 4, obols 17) orchard taxes for the 12th year: apomoira drachmas 2, obols 3, tax on the produce of oil obols 2, chalki 2, naubion obol 1, chalki 2, surcharges obols 3.5, chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1, obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5, chalki 2, in total drachmas 5, obols 4, chalki 2;;in total for the day drachmas 116."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- CPJ 3, 492 (lines with Sambathion) Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
